sourcesContent:
Item Detail

Item ID: {{ itemId }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-item-detail', templateUrl: './item-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./item-detail.component.css'] }) export class ItemDetailComponent { itemId: number | null = null; constructor(private route: ActivatedRoute) { } ngOnInit() { this.route.params.subscribe(params => { this.itemId = +params['id']; // Get the item ID from the route parameter // Load item details based on the item ID and display them in the template // You can fetch the item details from a service or API here. }); } }
